title: The tolerated residential structures shall be existing since prior to 17
clause_text: The tolerated residential structures shall be existing since prior to 17.04.1964 and non-residential structure shall be existing since prior to 01.04.1962 falling in the alignment of existing road or widening of existing road for which road line has been prescribed or DP Road.
section: Removal and re-accommodation of tolerated /protected structures falling in the alignment of road: -
